articles.description: Scotland were at their wildly entertaining best in the Calcutta Cup win over England. This was their perfect day, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Six Nations 2026: Bewildering, bewitching, bonkers - Scotland's perfect day against England

articles.description: Newcastle United beat Aston Villa in the FA Cup fourth round in a match dominated by a number of controversial decisions without VAR.
articles.title: Aston Villa 1-3 Newcastle: An advert for VAR? How many big decisions were wrong in FA Cup tie?

articles.description: Mohamed Salah scores and provides an assist as Liverpool brush aside Brighton at Anfield to reach the FA Cup fifth round.
articles.title: Liverpool 3-0 Brighton & Hove Albion: Mohamed Salah stars as Reds progress

articles.description: Great Britain's women curlers kickstart their campaign with a superb first victory of the 2026 Winter Olympics while GB's men also won but three British women missed out on skeleton medals.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026: GB women spring shock to beat world champions Canada

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Real Madrid vs Real Sociedad in the Spanish La Liga
articles.title: Real Madrid vs Real Sociedad: Spanish La Liga stats & head-to-head

articles.description: England got back to winning ways against Scotland but their T20 World Cup hopes look slim unless there are significant improvements, writes Matthew Henry.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: England must improve to have any chance of repeating previous World Cup successes

articles.description: Thirteen months after being embarrassed 8-0 by Manchester City, Salford City produce a performance to make their fans proud.
articles.title: FA Cup: Man City 2-0- Salford - from 'demoralising' 8-0 defeat to pushing Man City all the way

articles.description: Ireland survive a major scare from Italy to claim their first win in this year's Six Nations and deny the Azzurri a first championship victory in Dublin.
articles.title: Ireland 20-13 Italy: Hosts survive major scare to claim first Six Nations win

articles.description: Burnley manager Scott Parker is under increasing pressure as the Premier League side are dumped out of the FA Cup by League One Mansfield.
articles.title: Brilliant Mansfield pile pressure on Parker - is his time up at Burnley?

articles.description: Bayern Munich striker Harry Kane became the first Englishman to reach 500 career goals on Saturday, but what other records could he break?
articles.title: Harry Kane reaches 500 goals - what other records could he break?
